Build ID: 2.0.1

Steps To Reproduce:
I think was reported in the past, but I am not sure. So I am opening a bug just in case.

During the smoke test I created a 2.4 web project with a simple servlet. I then try to do a "Run on..." > Server using the J2EE Preview server. When WTP tried to start the server it thorws this exception. 

Config doesn't exist at C:\Documents
Port 8080
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.preview.internal.PreviewStarter.run(PreviewStarter.java:49)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.preview.internal.PreviewStarter.main(PreviewStarter.java:39)
New bug, looks like it is caused by spaces in the workspace path.
